Writer: Aoi Hiiragi (comic "Neko no Danshaku,  Baron"), Reiko Yoshida (screenplay), Cindy Davis Hewitt (screenplay: English version), Donald H. Hewitt (screenplay: English version)
Title: The Cat Returns
Actors: Chizuru Ikewaki, Yoshihiko Hakamada, Aki Maeda, Takayuki Yamada
Plot: After helping a cat, a 17-year-old girl finds herself involuntarily engaged to a cat prince in a magical world where her only hope of freedom lies with a dapper cat statuette come to life.
